  :param capacity: long

methods.fillFromChunk:
Our default, inefficient, implementation. Inheritors who care should provide a better implementation.

:param context: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.WritableChunkSink.FillFromContext) - A context containing all mutable/state related data used in writing the Chunk.
:param src: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.Chunk<? extendsio.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.Attributes.Values>) - The source of the data orderedKeys
:param orderedKeys: (io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.OrderedKeys) - An OrderedKeys representing the keys to be written
methods.fillFromChunkUnordered:
Fills the ChunkSink with data from the source, with data corresponding to the keys from the given key chunk.

:param context: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.WritableChunkSink.FillFromContext) - A context containing all mutable/state related data used in writing the Chunk.
:param src: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.Chunk<? extendsio.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.Attributes.Values>) - The source of the data orderedKeys
:param keys: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.LongChunk<io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.Attributes.KeyIndices>) - A LongChunk representing the keys to be written
methods.fillPrevChunk:
Populates the given destination chunk with data corresponding to the keys from the given OrderedKeys.

:param context: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.ChunkSource.FillContext) - A context containing all mutable/state related data used in retrieving the Chunk.
:param destination: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.WritableChunk<? superio.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.Attributes.Values>) - The chunk to be populated according to orderedKeys.  No assumptions shall be made
                    about the size of the chunk shall be made.  The chunk will be populated from position
                    [0,orderedKeys.size()).
:param orderedKeys: (io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.OrderedKeys) - An OrderedKeys representing the keys to be fetched
methods.getCapacity:
Get the capacity of this column source. This number is one higher than the highest key that
 may be accessed (read or written).

:return: (long) The capacity of this column source
methods.makeFillContext:
Allocate a new ChunkSource.FillContext for filling chunks from this FillContextMaker,
 typically a ChunkSource.

:param chunkCapacity: (int) - The maximum size of any WritableChunk that will be filled with this context
:param sharedContext: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.SharedContext) - Shared store of intermediate results.
:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.ArraySourceHelper.FillContext) A context for use with fill operations
methods.makeFillFromContext:
Provide a default, empty WritableChunkSink.FillFromContext for use with our default WritableSource.fillFromChunk(io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.WritableChunkSink.FillFromContext, io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.Chunk<? extends io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.Attributes.Values>, io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.OrderedKeys).

:param chunkCapacity: int
:return: io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.WritableChunkSink.FillFromContext
methods.move:
:param source: long
:param dest: long
:param length: long
methods.resetWritableChunkToBackingStore:
Resets the given chunk to provide a write-through reference to our backing array.
 
 Note: This is unsafe to use if previous tracking has been enabled!

:param chunk: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.ResettableWritableChunk) - the writable chunk to reset to our backing array.
:param position: (long) - position that we require
:return: (long) the first position addressable by the chunk

:param offset: long
methods.startTrackingPrevValues: Force my inheritors to implement this method, rather than taking the interface default.

text:
Simple array source for Short.
 
 The C-haracterArraySource is replicated to all other types with
 io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.Replicate.

 (C-haracter is deliberately spelled that way in order to prevent Replicate from altering this very comment).
